description.value:
The twin serrated blades of this legendary rhoka sword are dull black and constantly drip with blood. Life's Last Breath is said to have been forged centuries ago for an unknown urdefhan general and has since fallen into the hands of countless other powerful urdefhan warlords.

Life's Last Breath is a +3 greater striking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Unholy] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Wounding] rhoka sword with the following special abilities.

Activate R command

Frequency once per day

Requirements You successfully Strike a creature with Life's Last Breath

Effect You cast a 9th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Paralyze] spell on the target.

Activate R envision

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger You successfully Strike a creature with Life's Last Breath

Effect The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38] or take @Damage[4d6[void]] damage; you gain an equal amount of temporary Hit Points that last 1 minute.
